text: Chris Knight is an American country music singer from Slaughters, Kentucky. In 1997 Decca Records released his self-titled debut album. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Chris Knight (1998) * A Pretty Good Guy (2001) * A Jealous Kind (2003) * Enough Rope (2006) * Little Victories (2012) == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American country musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Kentucky
title: Chris Knight
